newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Brazil Cosipa, stevedores to meet on port dispute.
newsitem.headline: Brazil Cosipa, stevedores to meet on port dispute.

text.p: Stevedores from Brazil's Santos port are set to hold talks Monday with representatives from local steel firm Cosipa to resolve a labor dispute which already led to two strikes, a Cosipa spokeswoman said.

Stevedores have been protesting a decision by Cosipa to use its own workers to load and unload vessels at its private terminal in Santos. Last week union leaders presented a proposal to reduce total costs for Cosipa by around 60 percent.
Cosipa is now expected to reply to the proposal at the meeting to take place at 1400 local/1700 GMT but the spokeswoman said she had no information as to what the reply will be.
For the time being, no other meetings are planned, she added. ((-Caroline Bulloch, Rio de Janeiro newsroom, 5521 5074151))
